IX.iii.1.J.4.d
.
When to Calculate Net Worth
Calculate net worth when VA receives
an original pension claim
a supplemental pension claim after a period of non-entitlement
a request to establish a new dependent, or
information that the net worth of a Veteran, surviving spouse, or child has increased or decreased.
Exception
:  If the claimant does not meet other factors necessary for pension entitlement, such as military service requirements, VA will deny the claim without calculating net worth.
Reference
:  For more information on when VA calculates net worth, see
38 CFR 3.274(e)
.
